text:
—The sound of birds chirping from somewhere.
The sound of rustling leaves reaching the ears.
In a forest enveloped in silence.

In that forest, stood a solitary log house.
[Player] stood at the swept and clean entrance, and rang the doorbell.

name: Astar
text:
—!
W-wait!!
Coming right out!!

name: Astar
text:
W-Waited long!!
It's g-good to see you, you...
Oh, voice person!!!!
—The sound of startled birds flapping their wings and flying away echoed in [Player]'s ears.

name: Astar
text:
Munu... haa...
Finally, I'm a little calmer...

name: Astar
text:
...Still, I can't stay calm when I meet you...
No, I'm slowly calming down...

Leaving the flustered Astar,
[Player] checked the room they were invited into.

Though few in number,
the sparkling clean furniture and swept floor
indicated a welcoming intent for visitors.

On the furniture shelf were woodworking tools and
the stuffed animal they had observed at that time.

—And,
there was a slightly worn letter
that must have been read many times over.

name: Astar
text:
However, what is it that you said
you wanted to hand to me directly?
I will always answer your call...

name: Astar
text:
Oh, a gift!? From you!?
...Such a thing, are you sure?
I, I've already received enough from you, you know...

Astar held the wrapped item with his large hands.
His hands were trembling slightly.

—Astar continued to hold the wrapped item with his large hands,
and his eyes continued to sparkle.

name: Astar
text:
—Hmm, what?
"Open it quickly"?
...If it's your wish, then I have no choice.

name: Astar
text:
...Chocolate? I'm happy, but why...?
"Valentine's"?
That's a culture I don't know, could you tell me about it?

name: Astar
text:
Hmm, "a day to give chocolate".
The recipient is... someone important
to that person...

name: Astar
text: An important person!?

name: Astar
text:
W-Wait!!
If you say that, it's like, I...!
To you...!!

name: Astar
text:
Such, such a thing can't be true!?
Because, I was able to meet you again...
And anything more than that is...

name: Astar
text:
—No, that's not it.
What you taught me was...
"the truth beyond preconceived notions"

name: Astar
text:
Niko also said...
...Feelings can easily go astray,
so express them with words and actions as much as possible.

name: Astar
text:
...Thank you, voice person.
You are also very... very important to me.

name: Astar
text:
Thank you for the chocolate.
...I also want to return something in kind to you.
To give you my utmost effort.
Having said that, Astar hesitantly placed his hand over [Player]'s.

name: Astar
text:
...I want to convey my feelings to you.
How much I care for you...
To express that in words and in form.

name: Astar
text:
So... voice person.
"Observer"-san.
—My important person.

name: Astar
text:
Using "my everything".
I... want to prove my feelings for you.
